overview: Dr. Ouriel Faktor has over 20 years experience in the biotechnology industry. Prior to joining BioMarCare, Dr. Faktor held senior management positions in the diagnostic industry. He served as Vice President of R&D at Orgenics Ltd., a subsidiary of Alere Inc. of Waltham, USA, where he delivered numerous products from concept to the diagnostic market for almost a decade. Dr. Faktor’s area of expertise extends from clinical diagnostics to innovative bio-testing and bioanalysis technologies. He holds an MBA degree and a PhD from the Weizmann Institute of Science and was a post-doctoral fellow at the Salk Institute of Biological Studies in California.
